people.name: Gabor Mihaly Toth
people.description: Gabor is a computational historian at the University of Luxembourg; he conceptualised the VOICES project and authored the proposal.

people.name: Alina Bothe
people.description: Alina is a historian at the Free University, Berlin; she is an expert of the Holocaust with focus on survival testimonies.

people.name: Shrikanth Narayanan
people.description: Shri is an engineer scientist at the University of Southern California; he is a pioneer of behavioral signal processing.

people.name: Marcos da Silveira
people.description: Marcos is a researcher at the Luxembourg Institute of Science and Technology (LIST), specializing in making knowledge-based systems more collaborative and understandable.

people.name: Cédric Pruski
people.description: Cedric is a computer scientist at the Luxembourg Institute of Science and Technology. He works on artificial intelligence.

people.name: Mohamed Laib
people.description: Mohamed is a statistician at the Luxembourg Institute of Science and Technology; his specialty is data science.

people.name: Marcus Ma
people.description: Marcus is a computer scientist at the University of Southern California. He is interested in bridging the gap between how language models and humans understand language.
